subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants must beat the Redskins in the season finale, and hope the Packers lose to the Chicago Bears, to get in while the Jets backed into a wild-card spot after losing to the Bears.
snippet: The Giants must beat the Redskins in the season finale, and hope the Packers lose to the Chicago Bears, to get in while the Jets backed into a wild-card spot after losing to the Bears.
